question: Are you sure everything's ready? Are you positive?
Boy, this is it. This is really it... I mean... here I go.
answer: My beautiful boy! My angel... who is leaving his own mother.

question: Momma...
answer: So cold is your heart to leave your own mother?

question: Momma, I'll be right upstairs.
answer: So cruel is your heart? Is your heart so uncaring?

question: You should have put that on last night.
I just wait. For this... It's what I wait for... I wait all year.
So do I. I want to be ready... You have to be ready... It has to be there, in your mind.
Fucking A.
answer: I don't think about the shot that much.

question: You have to think about the shot. It's the shot. The shot's it.
What do you think about?
answer: I don't know... I guess I think about the deer... Being out, maybe. I don't know. I think about it all. Hell, I like the trees, you know? I like the ways the trees are, all the different ways the trees are too.

question: I'll tell you something, Nick. I wouldn't hunt with anyone but you. I won't hunt with a yo-yo.

Who's a yo-yo...? Who do you think's a yo-yo! They're all yo yo's. I mean they're all great guys, for Christ's sake, but... The point is, Nick, without you I'd hunt alone. Seriously. I would. That's what I'd do.
answer: You're a fucking nut. You know that, Merle? You're a fucking maniac!

question: Yeah. When it comes to hunting, that's true.
answer: Albert! For Christ's sake... John! Wait a minute, you guys!

question: Albert! For Christ's sake... John! Wait a minute, you guys!
You gotta hit it here. Here, Albert, not there.
answer: Where should I hit it? Just show me where I should hit it.

question: Here. Hit it here.
answer: Hey, that's neat. That's new, isn't it?

question: Couple of weeks... Listen --
answer: I love this car. Some cars sit, you know? This car, a car like this... grows. I mean you never know, with a car like this, where this car has been.

question: Linda...
answer: Hi. Nick, your shoes are soaking.

question: Linda, what's the matter?
answer: Oh... You know... I was just wondering... Nick... You're going hunting... If I could use this place to stay, because...

question: Sure. Are you kidding? Sure.
answer: I'd want to pay you... and I was thinking --

question: Linda... Hey, Linda...
answer: I would want to pay you, Nick... and I was thinking --

question: This is terrific...! This is really terrific! I don't know what we've been waiting for!
answer: I don't know! I don't know either!

question: Sit with Linda, man, will ya?... Give her a beer. Would you like a beer?
What kind of beer would you like?
Fucking A. See that ribbon in the left. That's Quan Son. That fucking guy was at Quan Son! We, ah... We're going too. What? What'd he say?
Maybe he's lost. Well, I don't know!
You wanna bet?
answer: I'll betcha! That's bullshit and I'll betcha! You're fulla shit!

question: Don't worry what it says in the book.
Just forget that. Forget what it says in the book.
answer: I'm gonna start slow... At the top. Then I'm gonna work down.

question: See you Monday.
answer: See you Monday. All set, hon?

question: Merle?
answer: You think we'll ever come back?

question: From Nam?
answer: Yeah. I love this fuckin' place... That sounds crazy. I know that sounds crazy, but I love this fuckin' place... If anything happens, Nick, don't leave me there. I mean it. Don't leave me... You gotta promise, Nick. You gotta promise me that.

question: You got it.
answer: Let's go huntin'. I mean let's do it!

question: That isn't it! There's no way that's it... Unless they changed it. They might have changed it. They changed it. That's what they did. This is it but they changed it. This is it. Definitely. This is it, but they changed it.
I'm telling you, they changed it!
Somebody took my pants... I know I brought pants. All right. All right, you guys. Whoever took my pants, I want 'em back!
answer: Sure I got boots. I got boots right here.

question: Some fuckin' friend... You're some fuckin' friend, Merle!
answer: You gotta learn, Vince! You come out here... You got no jacket, you got no pants, you got no knife and you got no boots. You think everyone's gonna take care of you! That's what you always think, but this time you're wrong. This time you're on your own!

question: No. No, no.
answer: Sal... listen to me, Sal! You have to do it.

question: I want to go home, Merle.
answer: You have to think about this, Sal. Listen to me, Sal! You have to think about this.

question: This is horrible!
answer: Listen to me, Sal. If you don't do it they'll put you in the pit. If they put you in the pit, Sal, you're gonna die... Sal, do you understand?

question: Merle, I wanna go home!
answer: Listen to me, Sal. Do it! You have to do it!

question: Hey, listen, you can do it. Believe me, you can do it. We can both do it. Then we go home, see? Then we go home!
answer: I'm telling you, Nick, no one's going to come.

question: I'm telling you, Nick, no one's going to come.
Listen, asshole, it's up to us!
answer: They bombed last night, right? Didn't they bomb? If they bombed last night, they could bomb tonight. They could be up there right now!

question: I thought you might be praying.
I suppose you wish you were somewhere else?
Nick, you're wasting your time... Listen to me! You're wasting your time! This is no fucking time for hoping or praying or wishing or any other shit! This is it. Here we are... And we gotta get out!
Get off your ass, Nick. Get off your fucking ass and stand up!!!
answer: Okay, okay! Okay. Okay, you're right... What about Sal?

question: I mean forget Sal... Sal can't take it, Nick.
Forget Sal... Listen to me -- forget Sal! I've been working on Sal since dawn, Nick. Sal's in a dream and he won't come out. LISTEN!!! From here on you gotta go for you. You hear me? For you!
LISTEN, NICK! GET IT THROUGH YOUR We gotta play with more bullets.
We gotta play with more bullets, Nick. It's the only way.
More bullets in the gun... The trouble is that still leaves one of us with his hands tied up, so that means we gotta play each other.
answer: With more bullets?... Against each other?... Are you crazy!!! Are you fucking nuts!!!

question: Nick... NICK!!! It's the only chance we've got!
I'll pick the moment, Nick. The game goes on until I move. When I start shooting, go for the nearest guard and get his gun.
When you get the AK, open up. You got me? Open up.
answer: YOU'RE CRAZY!!!... NO WAY!... NOW YOU'RE CRAZY!!! YOU'RE COMPLETELY CRAZY!!!

question: It's up to you, Nick. Now it's up to you. Him and me!!! Him and me!!! Him and me, goddamn it! Him and me! This is it, motherfuckers! Now he's going to do it! Watch! You watch! Look at him! See! This is it and he knows it! Last chance to lose your money there, guys. Goodbye money! Hurry, hurry. Here he goes! This is stupid! You understand stupid? On and on! At this rate we'll still be here tomorrow! Wait a minute. I know! Hey, I got it. More! Put in more! You understand more? More! More bullets! Three bullets! You understand three? That way BLAM! BOOM! KA-POWIE!!! BA-ROOM!!!... 'Cause I want that bastard! Him I want boom! Him or me!!! He's terrific! Great fucking guy! KA-POW!!! BA-ROOMIE!!! Both of us may have to pull on this, so get your shit in fuckin' shape!!! Him or me!!! Now we got it, him or me!!! Place your bets, motherfuckers! Now we're going! Now we got a game! Watch! Now watch! He's going to get it. And then KA-POW! BA-ROOMIE!!! You guys think I'm in trouble, right? No way! Never!!! MERLE IS MIGHTY! -- HA! MERLE IS STRONG! -- HA! MERLE IS MAGIC! -- HA! MERLE LIVES LONG! Lemme hear it. Come on, motherfuckers, lemme hear it! MERLE IS MIGHTY! -- HA! MERLE IS STRONG! -- HA! MERLE IS MAGIC! -- HA! MERLE LIVES LONG! See! Nothing to it. You got an empty chamber and it's in your mind! Just put that empty chamber in the gun! Who's for Merle? Is anyone for Merle??? Who here is for Merle...? Who... here... is for Merle...? MERLE IS MIGHTY! -- HA! MERLE IS STRONG! -- HA! MERLE IS MAGIC -- HA!
answer: Where are we going, Merle? Are we going home? Merle?

question: Right here.
answer: Where are we going, Merle? Are we going home?

question: Right here.
answer: Merle? Merle? Merle. Merle, a car! Hey! Hey, gee!

question: Damn it!!! God damn it!!! Sal! Sal... Goddamn it, Sal, don't you know anything?
answer: Where are we going, Merle? Are we going home?

question: You go ahead. Sal...! Sal!!! Sorry... Thought you were someone else. I love Linda, see. I love Linda more than I can even say.
That's right. That's exactly what I mean!
answer: I love Linda. Myself, I love Linda so much!

question: Only,good people love Linda, see. What Linda has, Linda --
answer: How you like to have nice fuck with Linda? You like that? Special, crazy fuck just like with Linda?

question: You mean...?
answer: I show you. Come. You come. Linda have special, crazy fuck. That right? I give you special, crazy fuck, just like Linda. Come. You come. Linda cry, make crazy moan? I give you cry, crazy moan. Come. You come. You like to call me Linda now?

question: Linda, yeah.
answer: You call me Linda, just like home.

question: Hey... Hey, elephants! Look at those elephants! Linda loves elephants! Linda... she loves 'em!
answer: Wait! First I give you special fuck!

question: Elephants! Make way... I gotta get elephants! Great... These are great. I wanna tell you these are great elephants! I'm going home, see... Stateside in a few days and my wife Linda, she loves elephants. She... she has a thing for elephants because elephants... Elephants go on. You know what I mean? They go right on. I don't know if they cry. Maybe at night. I mean... What I mean is my two best buddies are dead, see, MIA, who knows, and they would have liked some elephants also because... How much are these elephants? I mean let's talk elephant. (notices a GROUP OF STREET Everyone take an elephant! You know how to carry an elephant? That's what I thought. Right off I figured you as that kind of guy. Hey, wait a minute, I gotta get change. Take an elephant! Everyone take an elephant and then form up. Right here. Over here, like this, in a nice long elephant line... Good. That's good. Man, look at all these elephants! One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten... eleven elephants! Hey, but you gotta stand tall to carry elephants. Better. That's better. I mean... God damn, I mean that's elephants now! Wait. Now you wait while I get change. Hey, hey, the wind does blow. Hey, hey, the snow does snow. Hey, hey, the rain does rain... Hey, hey, the wind does blow. Hey, hey, the snow does snow... Hey, hey, the wind does blow. Hey, hey, the snow does snow --
answer: If you are brave and lucky I can make you rich. You have played? Once you have played it is not so hard. Cigarette? You seem... disturbed.

question: I... No. You do this for money?
answer: Mais certainment... A great deal of money. Naturally I do not do it myself. I myself do not possess the nerve. But I am always... how do you say... looking out for those who do... It is a thing quite rare. Champagne perhaps? Tch, tch. Don't say no. When a man says no to champagne, he says no to life and that no man must ever do. Where did you play?

question: Up north.
answer: Ah yes. Of course... So few survive. La creme de la creme... How did you obtain release?

question: We... Three bullets.
answer: And then you... How extremely clever. That is really most extraordinaire... Allow me please to introduce myself. I am Armand... And you are?

question: Nick.
answer: Nick. C'est extraordinaire! Do you know that I have a cousin who is called Nicholas and a nephew Nickolai. So you are, comme on dit, en famille. In the family.

question: I have to go.
answer: You are frightened, no? Of what is there to be afraid? The war? The war is no problem. It is a joke, a silly thing. I make one call and get you out.

question: See, I'm going home.
answer: Ah yes. Of course. To the girl who waits.

question: Yeah... Do you mind if I sit?
answer: But of course! Please make yourself comfortable. Perhaps you would enjoy some fresh caviar, or une petite glace, or --?

question: No. None of that.
answer: Unfortunately I must now go in, but I leave you my card. Naturellement I pay my players cash American. Just so you know. However, should you prefer German marks, or perhaps Swiss francs, this of course can be arranged. Everything can be arranged.

question: This is him. I'm telling you, this is Nick!

So he's in the next one, Albert. I mean take it easy. I mean you're driving everybody nuts! You okay? It's gonna be the next one. Okay? It's gotta be the next one. I mean it's gotta be! Right, Albert?
Guess who.
answer: Nick! Oh, Nick, you're back! I thought... Oh, Nick, I thought you were hurt, some accident. Maybe you fell or maybe some car... I thought someone stole you away!

question: No.
answer: Oh, Nick! Oh I missed you so! How are you?

question: Fine. I'm fine. How are you?
answer: Fine. I just go along, you know. Down at the market. Back here. I mean it just seems there's a million things to do!... Are you sure you're all right? I mean, what about the wound?

question: That was nothing. That wasn't anything.
It was just the complications. I mean, you take a little thing over there and then you get complications. I mean all the guys had it.
answer: I made you a sweater. Here... You have to take that off. I couldn't remember your exact size. Oh, that's fine. Perfect... It is a little too big... ... but I can easily fix that. Easily. One thing about wool sweaters, they are such a cinch to fix.

question: How's the trailer?
answer: Great. Fine... Once or twice it did fall off the blocks. I don't know what that's from.

question: Frost.
answer: Is that what it is? I couldn't figure out.

question: Did you get hurt? You didn't get hurt?
answer: Oh, no. It just kind of goes thump. Would you like a Coke? You don't drink Coke. Or maybe you do. What about champagne? Let's have champagne! I don't think we have champagne. Let's have this. See? Sparkling. I'll get you an opener. Oh, that's right. No opener. Let's just have beer. Do you want some cheese? Or maybe eggs? Maybe we should have coffee. Nick? I'm so glad you're alive! I'm so happy! I... I just don't know what to do!

question: It was all for nothing. Do you know that? It was all for nothing.
answer: Nick?... I just want to say how sorry I am about Sal and about Merle. How... I know you loved them and I know it's not the same. I mean now.

question: Naw, it's... I mean...
answer: Maybe... I don't know, if you want to talk --

question: Naw, it's... This guy wants his money. Does this... I mean, how does this job work out?
I'll kill 'em. Anybody bothers you, I'll kill 'em!
answer: Nick. It's okay... It's okay. I have to go now. Pick me up at eight.

question: Hey, Nick! God damn!... What've you been doin', I mean...
answer: Fuckin' guy's been shooting slants, Albert! I mean, what do you think?

question: I know, but...
answer: What do you think? You think he's been picking flowers? Fuckin' guy's been saving your ass, Albert. Everybody's ass! Even in Europe!

question: Rough, huh?
answer: Rough. We didn't have to do it, John.

question: No?
answer: No. How's Angela? How's she taking it?

question: Worse since she talked to who?
Nick, we don't know where Sal is... Nick, Angela won't tell us.
answer: Why?... What do you mean?... Why???

question: Nick, she won't say why.
answer: But Sal's mother! What about Sal's mother!

question: She's out of her tree, Nick. She is straight out of her tree.
I'm glad. Seriously... I'm very glad.
answer: Angela, I just heard Sal was alive.

question: Nick, he's fine. He's in a hospital and they're fixing him up.
Oh, sure... Twice a day.
answer: What hospital is he in? Where?

question: Nick... Sal is very weak. He suffered a severe wound... and right now he doesn't want a whole lot of people to get involved in a whole thing.
answer: Hey, Angela, Sal and I go back a long way.

question: He doesn't want people bugging him, Nick!
Did you ever think life would turn out like this?
How's it feel, huh? How's it feel to be back?
I mean, I guess you still think about Nam. Right? I mean --
Hey, Nick, you ever do it with one of those slants?
Oh, Jesus! You're kiddin'!
answer: One, Vince... you have to understand, doing it with one... would be... like nothing. They're small, see, so if you're smart you get about six or eight. I mean, if you want to have any fun.

question: Six or eight. And they go wild?
answer: They have these little sticks, Vince. They call them "chomp chomps", and when you get these girls going, you have to stick 'em in their mouths.

question: And I believed you! I oughta punch you out! I oughta...! Hey. Hey, let's go huntin'! Albert! Hey, Albert! Let's go huntin'. What do you say? Nick? What do you say?
Hey! Fuckin' A! Hey! Hey, John!
I see you're going hunting.
answer: Yeah... All the guys, we're all going huntin'. Like we did. You know? Like we always used to.

question: That's wonderful. I think you should... fresh air.
answer: You know how sometimes you're going along... You're going along... And that's all...! One thing is right after another, like steps... And you step along. I don't know where that is... It's gone! That's gone!

question: You're full of shit, Vince! You're so full of shit you're going to float away!
You, Vince! You! You are! You're a crock! You're a walking, talking crock!... I mean, what do you know?
I'm tellin' you she does it, Vince! With twenty guys you know!
Then what's the gun for! What's this for?
answer: In case!!! The gun's in case!!!

question: In case???!!! In case of what? In case you stumble on her, suckin' cock in the front fucking hall?!
answer: She might!!! She might do it, Albert, but you can't fuckin' tell me that she does!!!

question: She does, Vince! That's what I'm telling you! She does!!!
answer: Say that one more time!... Say it!!! Go on, say it!!!

question: Yeah.
answer: What the hell was that! What did you think? Did you think it was loaded!

question: You loaded it, Vince! I saw you!
The fuck you didn't!... Gimme that!
answer: What do you think? You think I don't know!!!

question: Oh. You know. How's it with you?
John Wayne's great... Listen, Sal. Jesus. When are you getting out?
What?
answer: Place is great. Really. One great place... Basketball, bowling. You name it. Canasta. Hearts. Lots of guys are making salad bowls. What I'll do is make a salad bowl for you, unless you'd rather have a pencil holder. The pencil holder's neat, I mean --

question: Wait a minute. Sal. Hold it. John Wayne's making so much noise I can hardly --
answer: I gotta get back, Nick. They're passing out popcorn now, so I'll be talking to you... maybe next year.

question: Thanks. Oh. Fine. No. Linda... Honey, what's wrong?
Hey. Look. There must be something.
C'mon. I've got the car.
answer: I'll be out... Just leave me. I'll be out. I'm fine. Really. I'm fine.

question: You okay?
answer: Let's make love, Nick. Let's make love forever!

question: Sal, we need you. We need you.
answer: Hey, Nick. How can you need me?

question: We do, Sal. We do... You're the heart. Sal, you're gonna die! You're gonna sit in that corner watching soaps and you're gonna die!... I'm not saying it's gonna be the same. It's not gonna be the same, but whatever it's gonna be we're all gonna do it, Sal. God damn it we are! We are gonna do it!
answer: Nick. I'm so scared. I'm so fuckin' scared to go home.

question: I know. It's like coming from the moon. Or Mars.
I tracked this one, a big buck. God, he was such a beauty--! What's this suitcase here?
Maybe Angela brought you stuff. I know she said -- Shit!
answer: Mom keeps sending me socks, Nick. I mean, if it's socks or something just let 'em go. Maybe you could use socks, Nick. Jesus, I mean, come to think of it socks are pretty expensive now.

question: It's not socks, Sal.
answer: Who is it, Nick? Who is it? I don't understand.

question: It's Merle, Sal.
answer: Merle? ... Merle's alive? How do you know?

question: I saw him last night. I thought I was dreaming. I thought I was out of my mind.
Yeah.
answer: But, Nick... Hey, I mean, where would a guy like Merle get money like this?

question: Oh cards, maybe. Poker... It's getting cold, Sal. I'm going to take you in. We'll call Angela. The guys can help her bring you home... Did I tell you I was going on a trip?
answer: Trip? What do you mean, Nick? You said you'd be --

question: It's okay. Hey, it's okay! Just a week. Just to see Phantom Mary.
Didn't I ever tell you about Phantom Mary?
Well... Phantom Mary's on my mother's side. Naturally no one there admits it because Phantom Mary's pretty weird... You want to hear the whole story?

Like I say, Phantom Mary's pretty weird... Lives alone, lives way out in the middle of nowhere with a cat called Pajamas and a cow called Fred. Well, last week I got a call from Phantom Mary, which in itself was very strange... Biederman! Where's Biederman!
I got you on this flight, Biederman. Is that right? Follow me, please. Right this way. Through here. Take off the uniform. Take off the uniform, Lieutenant!
answer: Please! Please mister, please! This is vital I go to Saigon. This is very important. Most important.

question: Listen, Biederman, I'm going to club you into the floor unless you tell me what the fuck is so important.
answer: That I must not tell you. Top secret. You see there. Topmost secret.

question: Biederman!
answer: I will not betray my country. No. Ne-ver!

question: When I get to Saigon I'll tell 'em where you are.
answer: Jesus Christ, they hit the airport! Those fuckin' niggers. This time I'm going to eat balls!... You ever try 'em?

question: Naw.
answer: Not bad fresh, but they don't keep worth a pig's fart. Lotta guys don't know that. Assholes! Tell you something else. Don't eat 'em in the damn Delta. Unless you like 'em fishy... Some do. I don't. I never did. That's you. Right here, Sergeant! He's right here!

question: Pee-pee. Merle!!! It's okay. It's okay, God damn it! It's all right!
answer: Hey, good buddy, how you doin'? This is Biederman, you guys. Biederman, this is Son Loc, Tu Fon, Huckerbelly and Potts. What's the story here, Biederman? We're looking for... Wait a minute. Here it is. Chez Armand. Honey, c'mere. Come right here. This is for bein' so smart. Let's go! Mount up! C'mon Biederman! Boy, do I love this conflict. Huh?... What the hell were you doin' in there?

question: You know a guy named Merle?
answer: Merle? That's who we're looking for. Merle.

question: Yeah?
answer: Sure! I got eight hundred potatoes says he goes one more... He retired, you know.

question: Yeah?
answer: Now he's back. He eats 'em... Sure... He eats 'em raw!

question: If you are brave and lucky I can make you rich. C'est tres amusant... You have been promoted. And to a Jew... I am joking of course. Naturellement. Seriously, Nick, may I hope that you have come to play?
Ah. Merle. And you know Merle?
Merle is under his tree... Beside the terrace. You can't miss him.
answer: Merle! Merle...! Jesus! Hey, how are you?

question: Merle! Merle...! Jesus! Hey, how are you?
answer: Nick!... I thought you went home.

question: I did. I... This is stolen. I came back.
Fine. She's fine... Merle, what the hell are you doing?
Merle... Hey, Merle, listen... Why?
answer: I like it because it's simple. I have to go, Nick. We'll have a drink.
